q: His appearance last month on "Late Show with David Letterman " was a triumph. And before "30 Chris Rock ," he was a writer on "Saturday Night Live," a gig he got after performing on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon . It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury, she said. Eric Schmidt summed up seismic shift at Google's helm in a Twitter post last week that said, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt has led Google since 2001, three years before the company went public in August 2004. Since then, Google's shares have grown more than sixfold, at one point surpassing$ 700. Google

"By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead." Larry Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. The news surprised and worried Google observers. " There was a lot of leaking out of the State Department, and the George H. W. Bush knew it, he said. "And it was unhelpful. And most of it ended up making the State Department look good. We didn't do that in the Pentagon. I insisted we not do it."
